entry.title: I don't know why I am, the way I am (not strong enough to be your man)
entry.summary:
Author: philosophically_incorrect

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,908Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 70

Summary: Eddie had known for far too long that the way he felt about Buck was different from anything else, but he played dumb and lied to himself and everyone else until he couldn't anymore.Because for those three minutes and seventeen seconds, something in Eddie had died. And when Buck began to breathe on his own again, it awoke with a name.***Set immediately after Bucks death, completely canon compliant to that point. I cried writing this (for multiple reasons) so I hope you enjoy!!!!! title taken from Not Strong Enough by BoyGenius (bc. duh?) honorable mention: Sailor Song by Gigi Perez (also duh).

entry.title: Mystery of human chemistry
entry.summary:
Author: UnrealVillain

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,664Chapters: 4/7Kudos: 6

Summary: Buck can't seem to figure out why he always ends up alone. Inspired by his new empty apartment, and loneliness that now feels unbearable, he sets out to find out why did his previous relationships fail, and is he doomed to repeat them by asking his five biggest heartbreaks: Ali Martin, Natalia Dollenmeyer, Abby Clark, Taylor Kelly and Tommy Kinard.Loosely based on the high fidelity movie and tv-show.

entry.title: Baby, I'm Dancing in the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: Alastair_alastair

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,208Chapters: 6/9Kudos: 117

Summary: TK loved these outings with the team. He loved it since the first time they all went to the honky tonk together after one of the first shifts the 126 ever did after the restoration. It was even better now that they were so close they were family and spending time together was as easy as breathing. It certainly helps having an incredible husband to dance with now, too.TK feels like he barely ever sees him anymore. He comes home late, he leaves early, barely drops by at the firehouse to visit. They don’t talk, they don’t go on dates, there is little to no affection given. The distance is growing by the day and he can’t stand it.But he promised he’d be here tonight. And TK will latch on to the little time they get to spend together like a starved man.----------------Or Carlos is becoming distant due to throwing himself into his work and TK misses his husband. Carlos is scared his new colleagues are homophobic and keeps his marriage a secret. Hurt husband and overprotective family occurs.Or 7 times someone else has asked TK to dance and 1 time Carlos finally did

entry.title: Embers Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 61,855Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 395

Summary: The picture on the back is a dark tree line contrasted by the wide blue sky above it. ‘GEORGIA’ is written in big white letters across the top, the bottom saying “Welcome to Adventure.” It’s faded, like it has taken one too many trips in the back of a mail truck, tattered and worn.Eddie flips it over, the back scrawled with quick but somewhat neat handwriting—something personal. Scanning the words his eyes drop to the corner—the address.‘Maddie Kendall, 1500 Hemlock Ave, Hershey, PA 17033’What the hell?Or,An AU where Buck's postcards, which he sent to Maddie, were forwarded to Eddie on deployment by mistake through a Military Outreach Program. They become a reason for Eddie to hold on through the dark times, becoming attached to the man behind the letters and his stories of his travels. Until, by a twist of fate, they bring him face to face with Buck himself.This AU is canon divergent. Some things change but some stay the same.

entry.title: we fell in love in october
entry.summary:
Author: lady_marshmall0w

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,366Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 16

Summary: A sigh severed the quietness. “Do you want kids?” Eddie asked curiously, though already assuming the answer.“Yeah. I mean, of course, I’ve always pictured myself having a family,” Buck paused before continuing, “Even if it’s not in the cards though, I’ll always have one kid,” he admitted, wearing the sweetest smile Eddie had ever seen, like teeth rottedly sweet. It made his heart skip a beat because Buck was talking about Christopher. He’d always be Chris’s family, obviously, so why was it setting Eddie’s skin ablaze thinking about it?-or-Eddie is having multiple realizations; he needs Christopher to come home, and he likes men, more specifically, one man.

entry.title: ever as before
entry.summary:
Author: literalmetaphor

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 98,091Chapters: 16/18Kudos: 355

Summary: Eddie really shouldn’t, but he asks, “Book of stories?”“Yeah,” Chris says. “That’s how I know Buck’s your true love, and how I know this whole town is a curse that my grandparents cast.”Oh dear god.Eddie’s makes a couple of incomprehensible sounds as he stares across the street and sees the slice of the harbor between the buildings. But eventually, in the interest of conversation, he asks, “So I’m in this book?”“Yeah,” Christopher says. “I don’t know all what happened because some of the pages are torn out, but I know you and Buck met and fell in love.”ORonce upon a time, there was a town in maine trapped between two worlds...

entry.title: bringing from the sky a secret (the gravity of us)
entry.summary:
Author: not-blonde-yet (stillredhead_just_tired)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,987Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 92

Summary: His fingers press lightly just below his navel.There it is again: that pulse. Like a second heartbeat.Buck jerks his hand back."Nope," he whispers at the mirror. “Nope. Nope. We are not doing this.”His stomach gurgles traitorously. Nausea rises, quick and dizzying, out of nowhere. He clutches the sink, breath catching as cold sweat breaks across his spine. It passes almost as fast as it came, but he’s left panting, skin clammy, hands shaking slightly."Okay," he mutters. "So maybe we are doing this." or: Eddie's breeding kink fantasy becomes startlingly real thanks to Buck's alien DNA (yeah, that's a thing) and now, they must find answers before their child arrives

entry.title: There is no other love, it’s only yours
entry.summary:
Author: Starlightbri118

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,272Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: God, Eddie was gorgeous. Fuck Buck and his inability to be anything but in love with him. And fuck it, the gut-wrenching feeling creeping in did nothing to stop the blush as Eddie caught Buck’s eyes, narrowing slightly as he took a better look at the blonde.“Wait, are you?” Eddie began to question, eyebrow raised slightly, as Buck giggled nervously, the blonde looking anywhere but at his best friend.Buck let out a breath,” Yeah,” nodding his head along, slightly turning his body to help shield himself better.Eddie started to shuffle, “Okay, one second,” as he swiftly stripped off his last remaining piece of clothing, bunched the drenched boxers in his hands, and threw them like a baseball to the edge of the water.Buck just stared,” What are you?” He got cut off by the wet ball of fabric flying past him and making a sloshing noise as it hit the sand.“Now we both are,” Eddie said with a sly smirk.---Or, the skinny dipping fic :)Inspired by the scene in Boot Camp where Whitney is skinny dipping at night and Axel catches her.

entry.title: Shape Of You.
entry.summary:
Author: Pnk_strawberry1

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,052Chapters: 11/12Kudos: 147

Summary: Eddie Diaz is a renowned professional fighter, celebrated for his power in the ring, and a devoted single father to his son Christopher, who brings immense joy to his life. However, Eddie has a deep-seated dislike for the idea of soulmates and predetermined relationships.On the other hand, Evan Buckley, a brave firefighter, has always held onto the hope of finding his soulmate, and his dreams have been filled with visions of their perfect encounter. So, when he finally meets Eddie on a normal Tuesday call, he is happy, excited, overjoyed, only to discover that his soulmate hates the idea of soulmates and is straight!?Will they be able to overcome their differences and find a deeper connection?———OREddie Diaz, a professional fighter and single father, Evan Buckley a firefighter, Happened to be soulmates! They are meant for each other, right? One problem though will maybe two Eddie Diaz hates Soulmates and is also Straight!?

entry.title: Plasticine
entry.summary:
Author: LoneswaggingRanger

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,498Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 46

Summary: In which Buck finds himself embroiled in a less than stellar relationship in order to cope with his failures. He deserves everything that's happening to him, surely. Buck climbed down from the truck, face blank. He'd been put on the sidelines again. Single man on hose duty while Eddie got two kids out of a burning building. When they returned to the firehouse, Bobby didn't bother speaking to him other than the cursory, "You're on cleaning duty tonight." Buck nodded placidly, and went off to get a mop.
